Title: Everyone Is Implicated
Writer: Courtney A. Kemp (created by), Courtney A. Kemp, Jeff Dix (executive story editor), Monica Mitchell (story editor), Gabriela Uribe (staff writer), Andre J. Ferguson (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: James "Ghost" St. Patrick forms a dangerous alliance with his brother-in-arms, Tommy, and mortal enemy Kanan. Angela is implicated in murder and turns to an unlikely ally. Tasha enlists LaKeisha to protect Tariq.
